mapper.sql: id AS "id", task_number AS "taskNumber", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", material_name AS "materialName", material_sku AS "materialSku", material_id AS "materialId", m_batch AS "mBatch", m_unit AS "mUnit", m_number AS "mNumber", operator AS "operator", operation_time AS "operationTime", task_state AS "taskState", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime",sorting_status AS "sortingStatus",sorting_type AS "sortingType",sorting_num AS "sortingNum"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_warehouse_replenishment_task where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
and operation_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operationTime},'%')
and task_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
